body:
Reason: spam

Of course I'm sure this is the kind of "spam" that was the reason captainmeta4 refused to approve @ExperiBass's bot: because it's stuff he personally dislikes, so that makes it "spam". You know this is starting to remind me of another site that's orange instead of porpl...

Edit: His alt account @Klenny says it was for "Epilepsy spam is not allowed". So now since the entire userbase except the admins and their discord buddies is considered schizos, I guess that makes all their content spam. Anything considered "crazy" (translation: disagrees with the admins and their discord circlejerk) is apparently now against the rules. Expect your posts to be censored and your accounts and guilds to be banned (unless you are one of their discord friends). So much for free speech.

Of course I'm sure this is the kind of "spam" that was the reason captainmeta4 refused to approve @ExperiBass's bot: because it's stuff he personally dislikes, so that makes it "spam". You know this is starting to remind me of another site that's orange instead of porpl...

Edit: His alt account @Klenny says it was for "Epilepsy spam is not allowed". So now since the entire userbase except the admins and their discord buddies is considered schizos, I guess that makes all their content spam. Anything considered "crazy" (translation: disagrees with the admins and their discord circlejerk) is apparently now against the rules. Expect your posts to be censored and your accounts and guilds to be banned (unless you are one of their discord friends). So much for free speech.

body:
Yeah, I dislike the spam too. I liked some of his other posts though, like [this one](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/1im6/someone-told-me-to-kill-myself) and [this one he made on another account](https://ruqqus.com/+WatchRuqqusDie/post/17x3/the-response-i-got-when-i). (I actually kind of like the users on the site who try to find fault with everything the admins do. Often, it's because of them that I know what's going on around the site (like user bans) because they post everything they see, and I like that. Of course I'm sure this is the kind of "spam" that was the reason captainmeta4 refused to approve @ExperiBass's bot: because it's stuff he personally dislikes, so that makes it "spam". You know this is starting to remind me of another site that's orange instead of porpl...

Edit: His alt account @Klenny says it was for "Epilepsy spam is not allowed". So now since the entire userbase except the admins and their discord buddies is considered schizos, I guess that makes all their content spam. Anything considered "crazy" (translation: disagrees with the admins and their discord circlejerk) is apparently now against the rules. Expect your posts to be censored and your accounts and guilds to be banned (unless you are one of their discord friends). So much for free speech.
post.title: @klenvastergan permanently suspended

body:
Now that I see that it makes sense.

He spammed that seizure gif for sure after having been repeatedly warned for spam before.

parent.body:
I'm guessing the spam they're talking about is this (unfortunately, I couldn't find any archives of the profiles of his alts, and I don't even know what alts he was spamming on other than perhaps THE_MADDEST_NIGGERS_XD_b):

* https://web.archive.org/web/20201229092505/https://ruqqus.com/@klenvastergan/comments
* https://web.archive.org/web/20201229083227/https://ruqqus.com/@klenvastergan/comments

Of course, most of it is in his own threads, but [not all of it](https://ruqqus.com/+Commentary/post/66hn/hoping-to-provide-some-clarity-for/ljus) is.

Unrelated, but I wish we could see the profiles of banned accounts.

<sup> - sfrohne [ If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username | [RIP Klenny](https://ruqq.us/2g1v) | Comment lnnl]</sup>
